item.description:
Hi,

Just come on down to this awesome coffee shop and we can all meet and talk and talk and talk...

This place actually grinds their own beans and just opened recently!

Really nice and classy too! It is called Coffee Roasters Cafe.

Hope to see you tonight,

DIRECTIONS: Take Rt 93 - Exit 3 = Rt 111 (East) - drive about 10 - 20 seconds and take the right onto Range road - They are down this road about 20 - 30 seconds in the same lot at The Common Man Restaurant.

Greg
item.how_to_find_us: You'll see the group - also just ask the barista(ess)
item.name: Saturday Night Coffee! [TONIGHT!]
